label: 三善為康
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (1049-1139). Originally of the Imizu 射水 family. Wrote Shūi ōjōden 拾遺往生伝 (Miscellaneous Lives of Saints"), Goshūi ōjōden. Comp. Chōya gunsai 朝野群載 (1113). [後拾遺往生伝] "
